label: 強訴
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: forcible petitioning by shrine affiliates or temple monks, a religious protest. Typically protesters carried a palanquin said to house their deity to a location occupied by their foes, intending that the deity would frighten their foes into compliance.
